description: Radon is a Python tool that computes various code metrics from source code.

options.description: show this help message and exit
show program's version number and exit

subcommands.name: cc
subcommands.description: Analyze the given Python modules and compute Cyclomatic Complexity (CC).

subcommands.name: raw
subcommands.description: Analyze the given Python modules and compute raw metrics.

subcommands.name: mi
subcommands.description: Analyze the given Python modules and compute the Maintainability Index.

subcommands.name: hal
subcommands.description: Analyze the given Python modules and compute their Halstead metrics.
